label: relatedCertification
comment: A certification related to this TT aggregation event.

rangeIncludes.comment: The process of certifying that a certain product, process or organization has passed performance tests, or qualification requirements stipulated in a standard or regulation.

domainIncludes.comment: Information about an event that captures the relationship between one or more physical or digital objects identified by identifiers, such as an EPC (Electronic Product Code) or EPC class, that are fully or partially consumed as inputs or as outputs.
